Articles.Content:
Here is my take on the Dassault Rafale multirole fighter, featuring many parts and 3dimensional accuracy which can be downloaded [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/epp5xnasmxtuv0b/dassault%20rafale.craft?dl=0)

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>![d8iFR4k.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/d8iFR4k.png?1)

![25L1bJz.png](http://i.imgur.com/25L1bJz.png)please leave your thoughts in the comments section (:

can it fly pretty far? 

like to the desert temple or ksc 2?

> 
> can it fly pretty far? 
> like to the desert temple or ksc 2?

how far it flies depends on altitude, if you go suborbital with it (I think it has enough intakes for it) you should be able to make it to the objectives stated. You could add drop tanks like on the real thing to extend its range and then you could probably make it even in low atmosphere.
Nice work with the cockpit looking good.

> 
> Nice work with the cockpit looking good.

Thanks (:

I wanted to use a stock cockpit but the size and shape were just so completely off, I decided to make my own

> 
> Thanks (:
> I wanted to use a stock cockpit but the size and shape were just so completely off, I decided to make my own

Agreed, stock cockpits are ugly as sin. Good job improving it man. It's a very nice build.
That looks just purely excellent! This looks exactly like the 3-view you have there. Most people don't build replicas which are this accurate!
Nice work! I love scale builds like this. That cockpit was ingenious.

> 
> That looks just purely excellent! This looks exactly like the 3-view you have there. Most people don't build replicas which are this accurate!

I'm not sure if its what you meant but that 3-view is an overlay of an actual diagram of the real thing, I used to build replicas from just the top down view and though they looked very clean and nice and they were the proper size, they just didn't feel as close to the real thing so recently I have started making these larger 3D replicas which are less clean and less pretty but capture the feel of the real thing better IMO

> 
> Nice work! I love scale builds like this. That cockpit was ingenious.

Yeah there really aren't many ways to do curves in KSP. The 'barrel cockpit' was the best solution I could find.
